meta.name: description
meta.content: With a focus on college success, Henderson Collegiate is one of the best charter schools Henderson NC to boost your child's education. Call 252-598-1038.
Charter Schools Henderson NC | Henderson Collegiate
With a focus on college success, Henderson Collegiate is one of the best charter schools Henderson NC to boost your child's education. Call 252-598-1038.

div.div: Enroll Your Child Fill out an application today.
Work With Us Learn about our current openings.

div.style: z-index: 5; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 36px; color: rgba(255,255,255,1);font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;text-transform:left;
div.div: In 2018, Henderson Collegiate was one of only 3.6%,
of all NC public schools to earn an A school performance grade.

div.style: z-index: 6; min-width: 1105px; max-width: 1105px; max-width: 201px; max-width: 201px; white-space: normal; font-size: 36px; color: rgba(255,255,255,1);font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;text-transform:left;
div.div: "Henderson Collegiate is a free, public charter school open to all students. Race, income, and prior academic success are not considered or asked about when enrolling at Henderson Collegiate."

div.style: z-index: 7; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 36px; color: rgba(255,255,255,1);font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;text-transform:left;
div.div:
In 2017, Henderson Collegiate earned the A+NG
for its third consecutive year, placing it in the
top 3.5% of all NC public schools.

div.style: z-index: 8; min-width: 1077px; max-width: 1077px; max-width: 194px; max-width: 194px; white-space: normal; font-size: 36px; color: rgba(255,255,255,1);font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;text-transform:left;
div.div: At Henderson Collegiate, students, staff and families work hard so that students may become better people, attend and graduate from the college of their choice, and become world-changing problem solvers.

div.style: z-index: 9; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: rgba(255,255,255,1);text-transform:left;

div.div: Enroll Your Child Fill out an application today.
Work With Us Learn about our current openings.

div.iframe: This iframe contains the logic required to handle Ajax powered Gravity Forms.
div.script: jQuery(document).ready(function($){gformInitSpinner( 8, 'http://hendersoncollegiate.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery('#gform_ajax_frame_8').on('load',function(){var contents = jQuery(this).contents().find('*').html();var is_postback = contents.indexOf('GF_AJAX_POSTBACK') >= 0;if(!is_postback){return;}var form_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_wrapper_8');var is_confirmation = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_confirmation_wrapper_8').length > 0;var is_redirect = contents.indexOf('gformRedirect(){') >= 0;var is_form = form_content.length > 0 && ! is_redirect && ! is_confirmation;var mt = parseInt(jQuery('html').css('margin-top'), 10) + parseInt(jQuery('body').css('margin-top'), 10) + 100;if(is_form){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_8').html(form_content.html());if(form_content.hasClass('gform_validation_error')){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_8').addClass('gform_validation_error');} else {jQuery('#gform_wrapper_8').removeClass('gform_validation_error');}setTimeout( function() { /* delay the scroll by 50 milliseconds to fix a bug in chrome */ jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gform_wrapper_8').offset().top - mt); }, 50 );if(window['gformInitDatepicker']) {gformInitDatepicker();}if(window['gformInitPriceFields']) {gformInitPriceFields();}var current_page = jQuery('#gform_source_page_number_8').val();gformInitSpinner( 8, 'http://hendersoncollegiate.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery(document).trigger('gform_page_loaded', [8, current_page]);window['gf_submitting_8'] = false;}else if(!is_redirect){var confirmation_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('.GF_AJAX_POSTBACK').html();if(!confirmation_content){confirmation_content = contents;}setTimeout(function(){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_8').replaceWith(confirmation_content);jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gf_8').offset().top - mt);jQuery(document).trigger('gform_confirmation_loaded', [8]);window['gf_submitting_8'] = false;}, 50);}else{jQuery('#gform_8').append(contents);if(window['gformRedirect']) {gformRedirect();}}jQuery(document).trigger('gform_post_render', [8, current_page]);} );} );

jQuery(document).bind('gform_post_render', function(event, formId, currentPage){if(formId == 8) {} } );jQuery(document).bind('gform_post_conditional_logic', function(event, formId, fields, isInit){} );

jQuery(document).ready(function($) {jQuery('.testimonial_content_slider .flexslider'). flexslider({animation: "fade",controlsContainer: "testimonial_content_slider",slideshowSpeed: 5000,animationSpeed: 600,namespace: "flex-",pauseOnAction:false,pauseOnHover: false,controlNav: false,directionNav: false,prevText: "",nextText: "",smoothHeight: false,easing: "swing"})});

div.class: post-973 rm_testimonials type-rm_testimonials status-publish hentry slug-tom-m odd_post_id

div.div: When I enter the halls of HC, the word that comes to to my mind is commitment. When you make a commitment, you build hope. When you keep a commitment, you build trust. HC is keeping their commitment to the families that entrusted in them, as a result a community is being transformed.
– Tom Miller, Leaders Building Leaders

div.class: post-1148 rm_testimonials type-rm_testimonials status-publish hentry slug-darrell-a-parents-for-educational-freedom-in-north-carolina even_post_id

div.div: The team at Henderson Collegiate focuses not on just teaching a student a lesson for a day; but lives by the Clay Bedford passage; teach them to learn by creating curiosity, and they will continue the learning process as long as they shall live.
– Darrell Allison, Parents for Educational Freedom in North Carolina

div.class: post-1205 rm_testimonials type-rm_testimonials status-publish hentry slug-keith-b-uncommon-schools odd_post_id

div.div: Henderson Collegiate is one of the best public schools in NC. High expectations are placed on the students and the staff. You can feel the learning happening.
– Keith Burnam, Uncommon Schools

div.script: jQuery(document).ready(function($) {jQuery('.testimonial_content_slider .flexslider'). flexslider({animation: "fade",controlsContainer: "testimonial_content_slider",slideshowSpeed: 5000,animationSpeed: 600,namespace: "flex-",pauseOnAction:false,pauseOnHover: false,controlNav: false,directionNav: false,prevText: "",nextText: "",smoothHeight: false,easing: "swing"})});

div.span: ATTENTION HC FAMILIES: Please see our Families page for the webinar recording from our HC Online Meeting, pick-up times for student devices, as well as for information on how to inquire about free Internet service. Our website, the Pride Online, is now accessible through the navigation menu of our website below.
div.a: Click Here to see the recording of our HC Online Meeting, pick-up times for student devices, access to spring break packet materials, or to learn more about accessing free Internet service.
